summary: A helper module that handles all auxiliary tasks required for training the GATNE‑T graph embedding model, including loading and preprocessing heterogeneous graph data, generating training pairs, building vocabularies, computing evaluation metrics, and parsing command‑line options.
business_intent: Enable users to efficiently prepare data and evaluate performance when applying the GATNE‑T embedding technique to heterogeneous networks, streamlining the end‑to‑end workflow for graph representation learning.
